Package gov.nist.secauto.decima.core.assessment

Class DefaultConditionalAssessment<DOC extends Document>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nist.secauto.decima.core.assessment.DefaultConditionalAssessment<DOC>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assessment<DOC>, ConditionalAssessment<DOC>
    public class DefaultConditionalAssessment<DOC extends Document>
extends Object
implements ConditionalAssessment<DOC>
    A concrete implementation of a ConditionalAssessment that acts as a decorator for another assessment. This allows any Assessment implementation to be made conditional.

      • appliesTo

        public boolean appliesTo​(DOC targetDocument)
                  throws AssessmentException
        Description copied from interface: ConditionalAssessment
        Called to check if the assessment applies to a given document. The provided XPath evaluation context should be used to perform the applicability check.
        Specified by:
        appliesTo in interface ConditionalAssessment<DOC extends Document>
        Parameters:
        targetDocument - the document to check applicability with
        Returns:
        true if the assessment applies to the document or false otherwise
        Throws:
        AssessmentException - if an error occurs while evaluating the condition
